description:
The Blades are a gang under the leadership of http://anidb.net/ch95710 [Miza], also known as Three Blades. They wear distinct masks, and claim the 18th Ward as their territory.
They were formerly affiliated with http://anidb.net/ch70052 [Aogiri Tree] until its fall and have since then joined http://anidb.net/ch99077 [Goat].
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Jin
